posts.title: Will Bun replace Node ???
posts.brief:
What is Bun?
Bun is a new runtime that provides an all-in-one toolkit for JavaScript and TypeScript apps. It ships as a single executable called Bun, making your app run really fast.
How Does Bun Do It?
